customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Jadeplume Terrorshroom's Parade

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "It is said that in the depths of the forest, there is a great being at the apex of all Fungi..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Jadeplume Terrorshroom" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Proliferating Spores" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Fungostro Cresta di giada
customize.desc:
"Lord of Fungi" Jadeplume Terrorshroom

If you keep silent and listen closely, you can here the sound of the ruler of the Shroom-Kin inspecting its territory…

customize.name: Fungostro Cresta di giada
customize.desc:
"Lord of Fungi" Jadeplume Terrorshroom

If you keep silent and listen closely, you can here the sound of the ruler of the Shroom-Kin inspecting its territory…

customize.name: Spore proliferanti
customize.desc:
Nuvola di polvere fungina

Pochi riescono ad attraversare in maniera sicura le trappole preparate dal Miconoide dotato di intelligenza superiore a quella dell'essere vivente medio.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Jadeplume Terrorshroom's Display

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "It is believed that when the Jadeplume Terrorshroom fans out those spectacular tail feathers and spread out its wings, it's exhibiting its most stunning yet most deadly form..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Jadeplume Terrorshroom" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Proliferating Spores" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Fungostro Cresta di giada
customize.desc:
"Lord of Fungi" Jadeplume Terrorshroom

If you keep silent and listen closely, you can here the sound of the ruler of the Shroom-Kin inspecting its territory…

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
